__e: They still live with their servants, who probably know so much of Rucastle's past that he finds it difficult to part from them.
I have servants who go to the marketplace for me.
You know what? We should do all of these things Oh, come on, honey that's easy for you to say
- 3,000 lire per day for meat, 5,000 lire per day for servants, just to be on the safe side and 10,000 lire per day for car and driver!
Papa, how may I be too high in rank to dine with the servants and too low to dine with my family?
That includes me, the servants and even you.
